text: Ilie Nițu (born 12 November 1931) is a Romanian former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Romania Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Giurgiu County
title: Ilie Nițu
